net.big_oh.common.flatfile
Class FlatFileRecordBuilder

java.lang.Object
  net.big_oh.common.flatfile.FlatFileRecordBuilder

public class FlatFileRecordBuilder
extends java.lang.Object

The FlatFileRecordBuilder class provides utility methods for creating the individual records (i.e. lines) that comprise a flat file.

Method Detail

buildFlatFileRecord

public static java.lang.String buildFlatFileRecord(java.util.Collection<FlatFileRecordField> fieldsForRecord,
                                                   java.lang.String fieldDelimiter,
                                                   char interFieldPadChar)
                                            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Builds a single record (i.e. line) in the flat file using the collection of FlatFileRecordField objects.

Parameters:
fieldsForRecord - The FlatFileRecordField objects used to construct a single record for the flat file.
fieldDelimiter - An optional character that can be placed between fields in the flat file record.
interFieldPadChar - The character used to fill any spaces that do not correspond to a field in the flat file record.
Returns:
A single record (i.e. line) to be included in a flat file.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the Collection of FlatFileRecordField objects overlap.
